job.title: Software Engineer I
job.description:
Abbott is a global healthcare leader that helps people live more fully at all stages of life. Our portfolio of life-changing technologies spans the spectrum of healthcare, with leading businesses and products in diagnostics, medical devices, nutritionals, and branded generic medicines. Our 109,000 colleagues serve people in more than 160 countries.
Join a dynamic and motivated team at Abbott Electrophysiology (EP), developing medical products that set the bar for clinical excellence and efficient workflow. Our products provide cutting edge, advanced software to enable 3D cardiac models which help in diagnosing and treating cardiac disease. As a member of the software development team you will help take these products to the next level and reduce cost, improve quality, increase access. The Software Engineer I contributes to all phases of the software lifecycle, including concept development, requirements, design, implementation, and testing.
At Abbott, you can have a good job that can grow into a great career. We offer:
